des:
Voice control for your Nox just got more intuitive. Alexa now includes light, Sleep-Aid, alarm control. You can also ask Alexa temperature indoors and your sleep quality. Here are some of our favorite phrase to get started：

Light Control：
-You can turn Nox on/off, for example“Alexa, ask Nox to turn on/off the light”or “Alexa, open Nox and turn on/off the light”
-You can change the brightness, for example “Alexa, ask Nox to turn up/down the light”or “Alexa, ask Nox brightness 10%（1%~100%） ”
-You can change the color, for example “Alexa, ask Nox to change the light color to red”or “Alexa, tell Nox that I want red color”,try asking Alexa for “White”, “Red”, “Orange”, “Yellow”, “Green”,“Cyan”, “Blue”and “Purple”

Sleep-Aid Control:
-You can start/stop Sleep-Aid, for example “Alexa, ask Nox to start/stop Sleep-Aid”or “Alexa, start Sleep-Aid by Nox”
-You can change the volume, for example “Alexa, ask Nox to turn up/down the volume” or “Alexa, ask Nox volume 1（1~16）”

Alarm:
-You can turn on/off the Alarm, for example “Alexa, ask Nox to turn off the alarm ” or “Alexa, tell Nox to stop the alarm”
-You can use snooze Feature, for example “Alexa, snooze by Nox” or “Alexa, ask Nox to turn on snooze”

Ask Nox some question:
-You can ask the weather indoors, for example “Alexa, ask Nox for the temperature/humidity/brightness/noise” or “Alexa, what’s the temperature/humidity/brightness/noise from Nox”
-You can ask your sleep quality, for example “Alexa, ask Nox about my sleep last night” or “Alexa, ask Nox my sleep score of last night”

How to Get Start？
1.Download Sleepace App in AppStore or GooglePlay and create a Sleepace account
2.Connect Nox to your Sleepace account
3.Enable the skill by clicking on the “Enable” button and log in to your Sleepace account
4.Say something to get start
